title: Find the Button: Apocalypse Edition
briefDescription: Welcome to my second Find the Button map. Last time, I made a Find the Button map where you only have half heart to beat ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to my second Find the Button map. Last time, I made a Find the Button map where you only have half heart to beat it. And now, I made another one, but each level is infested with zombies! That means you have to fight off zombies while finding the button!
How to play? It?s simple. You have to find the button while being chased by zombies. Before you start, you will receive a diamond and an emerald. Use those to buy equipments before starting the game. You can buy weapons, armor, and even special foods with different perks!
Special Foods:
? Toughness Cookie (Decreases taken damage by 40% for a short amount of time)
? Adrenaline Donut (Increases movement speed by 20% for a short amount of time)
? Healthy Burger (Receives instant health upon eating)
Here?s some screenshots of the map:

crawledImageUrls.text: This is a map that you will do several challenges until you reach the Boss. This map has several Halloween details and everything will be explained on the map? Have Fun!

title: Therealechonox?s Puzzle Map No. 3
briefDescription: This is the third map in my little series. In this one you are in space or on a different planet or something, inside a ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This is the third map in my little series. In this one you are in space or on a different planet or something, inside a space station of sorts. Your final goal is to turn on the reactor. But watch out! Some parts of the station are covered in this weird material called ?C9tamination!? You will need to find a Bio-suit to enter these areas. This map has been tested and is completely functional. Finally, you may not be alone in this space station?

title: Room Escape
briefDescription: What would you do if you were locked in a room... And your only memory was that you needed to escape! This map is inspired ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
What would you do if you were locked in a room? And your only memory was that you needed to escape! This map is inspired by the point-and-click adventure games. In this map, you are investigating the past of Charles Reolosus. Upon entering his old factory, you realise that you are locked in and you need to escape. Read the various journals scattered about to learn more about the predicament you are now in.
***IMPORTANT*** Be sure to only rename papers, or else this map will most certainly break!

title: Prison Escape 2
briefDescription: Welcome to the Dungeon. This is a facility made to deal with the worst of the worst. You will have to endeavor through parkour and ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Welcome to the Dungeon. This is a facility made to deal with the worst of the worst. You will have to endeavor through parkour and puzzles. Good luck trying to escape.

title: Find The Buttons!
briefDescription: This is a find the buttons map that contains 14 challenging levels. This map works only in singleplayer. This map also offers you hints that you ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a find the buttons map that contains 14 challenging levels. This map works only in singleplayer. This map also offers you hints that you can use throughout the map.
This is my first map, so I hope you enjoy! Each level has a hidden button that you must find and press.
This map works only in singleplayer.

You will be given 3 hints that use can use through out the map. Use them wisely!
If you find the 2 secret buttons hidden in levels 2 and 9, you can unlock the secret room at the end of the map!

title: Mr. Meat 1.9.2 BETA 0.9 (Horror)
briefDescription: This is a horror map, in it you have to find out the secret of Mister Meat and save the girl! Look for clues, solve ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a horror map, in it you have to find out the secret of Mister Meat and save the girl! Look for clues, solve puzzles! Will you be able to find out the secret and save Alelia? Good luck! ATTENTION! THIS IS THE BETA VERSION OF THE MAP, HERE COULD BE BUGS, DEFECTS, ETC ? SO DON?T HAVE TO COMPLAIN ABOUT THIS. WE WILL FIX EVERYTHING IN THE RELEASE OF THE MAP.
Run away from the scary zombie, get the jail break & solve this criminal case!

The zombie plague arrived to your neighborhood! Your neighbor, the butcher, is a zombie hungry of blood. He has no soul and only wants kill, to have blood and fresh meat to eat. He has become a serial killer and his house in a mix between a haunted house and a prison. This creepy zombie, known as Mr. Meat, is a serious criminal case. His new hostage? A girl. She is locked in this prison house that seems a haunted house. Death is after her, your scary zombie neighbor is going to slay her?if nobody avoid it. Your mission is rescue her and save her life!

How to do it in this horror game adventure?
? The walking dead can hear your moves, use this to your advantage and hide to mislead him. If their eyes catch you, he?ll try to kill you!
? Solve puzzles to rescue the girl alive from the house of the serial killer.
? Use the gun and be a sniper! Be the zombie catcher that this game needs! Action is guaranteed!
? Enjoy excellent ambiental sounds and graphics during your jail break!
If you want a realistic, creepy and scary sniper, zombie catcher experience, play now ?Mr Meat: Horror Escape Room?. Action, blood and fear assured!
Headphones are recommended for a full experience against the walking dead neighbor.
In each update new content will be available to solve this criminal case. We are open to suggestions by email or in the review section!

briefDescription: This is an escape room I made for me and my friends to play on. I'm uploading this so that they can download it. Feel ...

Feel free to download if you wanna play it, There?s one level and a secret extras area. This map is short if you don?t include finding all the extra stuff. Single-player is recommended but you can play with more than one person.

title: Black Lake Camp (Hide & Seek)
briefDescription: Black Lake Camp is a new hide & seek map. The goal of the hider is to hide in the Black Lake Camp away from the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Black Lake Camp is a new hide & seek map. The goal of the hider is to hide in the Black Lake Camp away from the seeker. The seeker is released is 1 minute after the game starts. The seeker?s mission is to kill all the hiders, if you really want you can set your own timer and when that timer ends the players that are left over have won.
Screenshots:

There Are 7 Different Places To Hide:
1. Cave
2. Camp Site
3. Camp Fire
4. Toilet
5. Forest
6. House
7. Lake
This Is Where The Hiders Run Out Of:
In Between The Lake And Cave:
Camp Site:

title: Brain Teaser
briefDescription: Do you like to do puzzles? If so, come try Brain Teasers. This map allows to do that. Open your mind to solve and play ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Do you like to do puzzles? If so, come try Brain Teasers. This map allows to do that. Open your mind to solve and play decently hard puzzles. At a glance it may seem normal but in reality, you must your your intelligence to past the levels.

title: Parkour Strategy Course
briefDescription: Grab your friends and play through 45 levels of parkour and puzzles. Custom made map with themes added to every level. Can take around an hour ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Grab your friends and play through 45 levels of parkour and puzzles. Custom made map with themes added to every level. Can take around an hour to a few to complete. Try it out. Make sure you give everyone permissions to press buttons and open containers.
Here are a few pictures of some of the areas you play through in the Strategy Course. There are three courses each having 15 levels. 45 levels in total. Each course?s puzzles and parkour become longer and more difficult than the last. If you consider yourself a player that enjoys parkour and creative puzzles, then this is a great map for you to play. Do you have friends? You can play with them and solve the challenging puzzles together. The best part about this map is that its free and provides hours of content. Make sure you give everyone permissions to press buttons and open containers.
This video is a walk through of the map. If you are stuck on part of the map, skip to the part of the video where you are at and watch from there.

title: Minigames++
briefDescription: Minigames ++ is a minigames map with 4 games in 1 map.This map is very fun to This map is very fun to play, especially when there ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Minigames ++ is a minigames map with 4 games in 1 map.This map is very fun to This map is very fun to play, especially when there are songs on the map.There are many games that you can complete and get points afterwards. Enjoyy
When you enter the map, you will be greeted by a lobby with a nether theme. After that, enter the portal and you will be teleported to a lobby with a choice of minigames. What are the existing minigames? Check out a collection of several minigames below?
A Parkour with 4 impossible level
A maze with challenge, don?t jump!
A big and hard Dropper

crawledImageUrls.text:
Suddenly, you found out that you are trapped inside a Woodland Mansion. But it?s different, it?s all dark and black, and there are no Illagers there! It?s just you and?. a monster.
Find your way to escape the mansion while being chased by a monster in a dark horror mansion where you can?t see anything!

There are some screens:

title: Portal Pieces
briefDescription: A mashup of puzzle solving, parkour, and fighting! Use your brain to find the missing nether portal pieces, and face the nether's dangerous parkour course ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A mashup of puzzle solving, parkour, and fighting! Use your brain to find the missing nether portal pieces, and face the nether?s dangerous parkour course as you collect materials to show the Ender Dragon that you are a champion!
This map that starts off with a set of puzzles in the Overworld. Each completed puzzle will award you with blocks of obsidian to complete a broken nether portal.
Beyond that portal is a challenging parkour course with hidden items to find along the way! An end portal awaits you at the end of all those dangerous jumps!
The Ender Dragon awaits your arrival in the End, so hype yourself up for a good fight!
Everything should be adequately easy to figure out on your own. However, if you get stumped in the puzzle solving portion, here is the walkthrough: Portal Pieces Overworld Walkthrough
The parkour portion should be relatively straightforward, but if you are unsure of where to proceed, try looking around. The parkour jumps are quite challenging, so be persistent!

title: Cooperative Map ?White and Bright?
briefDescription: The map for two players White and Bright. Find yourself in a strange white building with your friend. Although this building does not have a ...

crawledImageUrls.text: The map for two players White and Bright. Find yourself in a strange white building with your friend. Although this building does not have a single source of light, it is brightly lit inside. Working together, solve all the puzzles and passing through the building complete the map!
